rev.comment: reverting: I am sorry, but that is kind of the point of the program: download at maximum speed, therefore it must use bandwith. If you have problems, you can easily limit the max. speed in the setting
rev.diff:
Line 40: Line 40:
As reasons for these measures, they've stated that they have to make money in some way, and that they'd rather do it via mild browser takeover that can be turned off than installing actual [[spyware]] or [[adware]] software on people's computers or charging for the program.

The downloader can saturate your Internet connection and crowd out all other activity as long as it is active.
 
Orbit has been repeatedly approached with offers to buy the program, but they've declined to sell it as they don't want to compromise its integrity.
